str2: A prolonged form of the feminine of moichos; an adulteress.
From genos; a generation; by implication, an age.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To seek after, desire, search for, make inquiries about. From epi and zeteo; to search for; intensively, to demand, to crave.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of the base of semaino; an indication, especially ceremonially or supernaturally.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of the base of semaino; an indication, especially ceremonially or supernaturally.
(Hebrew), Jonah, the Hebrew prophet. Of Hebrew origin; Jonas, the name of two Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From kata and leipo; to leave down, i.e. Behind; by implication, to abandon, have remaining.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and erchomai; to go off, aside or behind, literally or figuratively.
